content: प्रती(प्रति-इ) {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To go back to, return; प्रतीयाय गुरोः सकाशं <ls>R. 5. 35</ls>; <ls>Bk. 3. 19.</ls> {@--2@} To go to, approach, turn to. {@--3@} To fall to the lot of. {@--4@} To reach, attain. {@--5@} To believe, trust, be certain or sure of, rely on; कः प्रत्येति सैवेयमिति <ls>U. 4</ls>; <ls n="U.">1. 44.</ls> {@--6@} To learn, understand, know, प्रतीयते धातुरिवे हितं फलैः <ls>Ki. 1. 20</ls>; <ls>Śi. 1. 69.</ls> {@--7@} To be well-known or celebrated; सोयं वटः श्याम इति प्रतीतः <ls>R. 13. 53.</ls> {@--8@} To be pleased or satisfied; प्रति प्रतीतः प्रसवोन्मुखीं प्रियां (ददर्श) <ls>R. 3. 12</ls>; <ls n="R.">16. 23.</ls> {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} {@--1@} To be recognized or perceived. {@--2@} To be proved, turn out to be true. {@--3@} To follow from anything (as a necessary result). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (प्रत्याययति) {@--1@} To cause to believe; convince, inspire confidence; एष विवाद एव प्रत्याय यति <ls>Ś. 7</ls>; <ls n="Ś.">5. 31</ls>; ताः स्वचारित्र्यमुद्दिश्य प्नत्याययतु मैथिली <ls>R. 15. 73.</ls> {@--2@} To cause to perceive, bring to mind. {@--3@} To prove, demonstrate, show.
